title: 11 Miami Architects, Builders, and Landscape Architects to Know From the AD PRO Directory
description: Searching for Miami architects, builders, or landscape architects to hire? Look no further than our list of AD-approved talent
author: Elizabeth Stamp
excerpt: Searching for Miami architects, builders, or landscape architects to hire? Look no further than our list of AD-approved talent
text: Over the past several years, Miami architects, builders, and landscape architects have been in high demand as construction booms, with high-rises and private homes transforming the city’s skyline and residential neighborhoods. The influx of building has given Miami firms an opportunity to showcase their talent, designing striking residences for South Florida’s high-profile clientele. Whether they are restoring historic Spanish-style homes, transforming sky-high penthouse apartments, or building oceanfront homes from the ground up, the Miami architects, builders, and landscape architects on the AD PRO Directory work closely with clients to help them create Magic City residences that reflect their clients’ personalities, flaunt exceptional art collections, and offer indoor-outdoor living.ArchitectsFor a home in Coconut Grove, Florida, Strang Design constructed a long colonnade with wooden structural “fins” that look out onto the pool, while a cantilever of the living room and dining room on the upper level has access to a planted rooftop terrace. Photo by Kris TamburelloStrang Design brings architecture, interior design, and landscape design services together under one roof, resulting in homes that feel cohesive, inside and out. The Miami-based multidisciplinary design firm is known for its use of “environmental modernism” to craft contemporary residences that are deeply connected to their surroundings. Founded in 1998 by Max Strang, the firm works on projects throughout Florida as well as further afield, including residences in Colorado and the United Arab Emirates.Inspired by Bal Harbour waters, Studio Rodrigo Buelvas’s penthouse concept envisions a coastal environment with natural materials, including white oak wood veneer and terrazzo, and low-slung profiles. Photo by Adam Kuehl PhotographyCollaboration is at the heart of Studio Rodrigo Buelvas’s process. The firm works closely with its clients, and its multidisciplinary team offers a wide range of perspectives and skills. The finished projects blend Latin American influences with global inspirations and technological innovation. Led by its namesake founder, the Miami-based firm takes on a diverse selection of projects globally, from designing 3D-printed micro-homes to transforming a historic firehouse into a hat atelier.This luxurious home by Luster Studio features a stunning pool, outdoor kitchen, and glass walls. Photo by José HernándezResidences by Luster Studio showcase seamless indoor-outdoor living at its finest. Founded by architect Jose Hernandez, the firm designs residential and hospitality projects, from multiunit developments to single-family homes. Working in English and Spanish, Hernandez and his team guide clients through each stage of the project from brainstorming to completion, incorporating eco-friendly materials and pieces from esteemed art galleries. The modern retreats are expertly edited, allowing the architecture and views to shine.Yellow House Architects designed an urban aerie in 200 East 75th Street, a new development on New York’s Upper East Side. Image by DBOXAD100 architect Elizabeth Graziolo and her firm, Yellow House Architects, bring a fresh perspective and modern sensibility to classical architecture. With offices in New York and Miami, the firm has become highly sought-after for everything from historical renovations to new developments. Creative collaboration drives the firm’s work, and it boasts a diverse list of current projects including a 90-acre agricultural neighborhood in Atlanta, as well as residences in Coconut Grove, Palm Beach, and Turks and Caicos.BuildersArt is the common thread running through this Fort Lauderdale apartment, a refined retreat designed by The Art of Design for a family of five. Organic shapes, durable materials, and bold yet tranquil elements define the interiors, enhancing the relaxed seafront atmosphere with thoughtful, sculptural detail. Photo by Yara VirreiraMiami-based builder The Art of Design Inc. brings together interior design and construction, giving it the ability to manage every aspect of a project. Founder and interior designer Monica Slodarz leads the team, which includes an in-house construction team. The Art of Design works on projects of all sizes, from apartment transformations to ground-up developments, incorporating design solutions and unique elements that are personalized to each client’s needs and style.This fully renovated Coconut Grove residence by Builcore, with interiors by Design Solutions Miami, showcases impeccable craftsmanship and attention to detail in every aspect. Photo by Craig Denis CreativeBuilding in the city’s most exclusive neighborhoods and frequently collaborating with top architects and designers, Builcore Inc. specializes in high-end commercial and luxury residential projects, from modernizing Spanish-style mansions to transforming high-rise apartments into contemporary aeries. The firm tailors its approach to each project, whether clients need general contracting, construction management, or complete design-build services. The firm brings a wealth of experience and project management acumen, keeping projects on schedule and on budget.To Better Days Building collaborated with Choeff Levy Fischman Architecture + Design on a two-story, 13,000-square-foot residence located on North Bay Road and featuring an abundance of glass that allows direct connectivity from the home to Biscayne Bay. Led by registered architect turned general contractor Zachary Carpenter, To Better Days Building takes a dynamic approach, constantly adjusting to the needs of the homeowner and project stakeholders. The builder boasts decades of experience in construction and development and has become known for its ability to complete complex luxury projects with efficiency and skill. To Better Days Building also prides itself on establishing long-term relationships with clients, remaining a resource even after the project ends.A striking new ground-up residence on Sunset Island, Miami Beach, blends sculptural modernism with coastal serenity. It was built by Navicon Construction, with architecture by Koda and interiors by Studio Roda. Photo by NaviconFrom penthouses to waterfront residences, Navicon Construction brings creativity and out-of-the-box solutions to every project. Founded by general contractors Antonio Torres and Miguel Circelli, the firm handles even the most complex designs with confidence and care. Whether working on a renovation or constructing a home from the ground up, Navicon Construction prides itself on providing personalized service and exacting attention to detail, ensuring that the smallest design elements are beautifully executed.Casa Costanera by MV Group USA is a 7,000-square-foot-home, custom furnished with B&B Italia goods. MV Group USASince it was founded in 2007 by president and CEO Manny Angelo Varas, MV Group USA has become a go-to builder for high-profile Miami residents. The firm has built homes in the city’s most exclusive areas, including Coral Gables, Baypoint, Star Island, and Cocoplum, and completed interior renovations on Fisher Island and at Residences by Armani Casa. The custom building firm frequently partners with top architects and designers and focuses on executing their clients’ vision. Among MV Group USA’s current projects is the largest single-family home in Miami-Dade County.Landscape DesignersFor the zen entrance of a Keystone Islands residence, Studio Arth added structured stepped planters, Corten Steel-held gravel, and lush tropical planting to evoke a feeling of balance and harmony. Photo: Guy Champin, Studio PYGFounded by landscape architect Rituparna Simlai in 2018, Coral Gables–based Studio Arth crafts lush outdoor spaces that showcase Florida’s natural beauty within urban settings. The firm’s immersive environments utilize native plantings and provide habitats for hummingbirds, butterflies, and other local fauna. Studio Arth applies its purpose and meaning-driven design philosophy to a wide range of residential and commercial projects including Miami hot spots, cultural institutions, and private homes throughout the area.The Enea Tree Museum in Lake Zürich in Rapperswil-Jona showcases 25 varieties of trees, as well as sculptures by artists including Richard Erdman and Sylvie Fleury. Photo by Enea Landscape ArchitectureEnea Landscape Architecture enhances sites around the world with context-driven designs that promote sustainability and preservation. Founded by Enzo Enea, the global firm operates from offices in Miami, Brooklyn, Switzerland, and Italy, with US managing director Carolina Jaimes leading the team in America. From terraces to private gardens to public parks, Enea expertly crafts landscapes that respond to the local conditions and lessen the impact of climate change.Get AD-ApprovedJoin the AD PRO Directory, our professional network that puts you in front of the right clients. Learn moreArrowAre you looking for an interior decorator or designer to hire for your next project? Wherever you are, visit the AD PRO Directory to browse our list of AD-approved designers and find your match for a design consultation.
html:
Over the past several years, Miami architects, builders, and landscape architects have been in high demand as construction booms, with high-rises and private homes transforming the city’s skyline and residential neighborhoods. The influx of building has given Miami firms an opportunity to showcase their talent, designing striking residences for South Florida’s high-profile clientele. Whether they are restoring historic Spanish-style homes, transforming sky-high penthouse apartments, or building oceanfront homes from the ground up, the Miami architects, builders, and landscape architects on the AD PRO Directory work closely with clients to help them create Magic City residences that reflect their clients’ personalities, flaunt exceptional art collections, and offer indoor-outdoor living.

Architects

Strang Design brings architecture, interior design, and landscape design services together under one roof, resulting in homes that feel cohesive, inside and out. The Miami-based multidisciplinary design firm is known for its use of “environmental modernism” to craft contemporary residences that are deeply connected to their surroundings. Founded in 1998 by Max Strang, the firm works on projects throughout Florida as well as further afield, including residences in Colorado and the United Arab Emirates.

Collaboration is at the heart of Studio Rodrigo Buelvas’s process. The firm works closely with its clients, and its multidisciplinary team offers a wide range of perspectives and skills. The finished projects blend Latin American influences with global inspirations and technological innovation. Led by its namesake founder, the Miami-based firm takes on a diverse selection of projects globally, from designing 3D-printed micro-homes to transforming a historic firehouse into a hat atelier.

Residences by Luster Studio showcase seamless indoor-outdoor living at its finest. Founded by architect Jose Hernandez, the firm designs residential and hospitality projects, from multiunit developments to single-family homes. Working in English and Spanish, Hernandez and his team guide clients through each stage of the project from brainstorming to completion, incorporating eco-friendly materials and pieces from esteemed art galleries. The modern retreats are expertly edited, allowing the architecture and views to shine.

AD100 architect Elizabeth Graziolo and her firm, Yellow House Architects, bring a fresh perspective and modern sensibility to classical architecture. With offices in New York and Miami, the firm has become highly sought-after for everything from historical renovations to new developments. Creative collaboration drives the firm’s work, and it boasts a diverse list of current projects including a 90-acre agricultural neighborhood in Atlanta, as well as residences in Coconut Grove, Palm Beach, and Turks and Caicos.

Builders

Miami-based builder The Art of Design Inc. brings together interior design and construction, giving it the ability to manage every aspect of a project. Founder and interior designer Monica Slodarz leads the team, which includes an in-house construction team. The Art of Design works on projects of all sizes, from apartment transformations to ground-up developments, incorporating design solutions and unique elements that are personalized to each client’s needs and style.

Building in the city’s most exclusive neighborhoods and frequently collaborating with top architects and designers, Builcore Inc. specializes in high-end commercial and luxury residential projects, from modernizing Spanish-style mansions to transforming high-rise apartments into contemporary aeries. The firm tailors its approach to each project, whether clients need general contracting, construction management, or complete design-build services. The firm brings a wealth of experience and project management acumen, keeping projects on schedule and on budget.

Led by registered architect turned general contractor Zachary Carpenter, To Better Days Building takes a dynamic approach, constantly adjusting to the needs of the homeowner and project stakeholders. The builder boasts decades of experience in construction and development and has become known for its ability to complete complex luxury projects with efficiency and skill. To Better Days Building also prides itself on establishing long-term relationships with clients, remaining a resource even after the project ends.

From penthouses to waterfront residences, Navicon Construction brings creativity and out-of-the-box solutions to every project. Founded by general contractors Antonio Torres and Miguel Circelli, the firm handles even the most complex designs with confidence and care. Whether working on a renovation or constructing a home from the ground up, Navicon Construction prides itself on providing personalized service and exacting attention to detail, ensuring that the smallest design elements are beautifully executed.

Since it was founded in 2007 by president and CEO Manny Angelo Varas, MV Group USA has become a go-to builder for high-profile Miami residents. The firm has built homes in the city’s most exclusive areas, including Coral Gables, Baypoint, Star Island, and Cocoplum, and completed interior renovations on Fisher Island and at Residences by Armani Casa. The custom building firm frequently partners with top architects and designers and focuses on executing their clients’ vision. Among MV Group USA’s current projects is the largest single-family home in Miami-Dade County.

Landscape Designers

Founded by landscape architect Rituparna Simlai in 2018, Coral Gables–based Studio Arth crafts lush outdoor spaces that showcase Florida’s natural beauty within urban settings. The firm’s immersive environments utilize native plantings and provide habitats for hummingbirds, butterflies, and other local fauna. Studio Arth applies its purpose and meaning-driven design philosophy to a wide range of residential and commercial projects including Miami hot spots, cultural institutions, and private homes throughout the area.

Enea Landscape Architecture enhances sites around the world with context-driven designs that promote sustainability and preservation. Founded by Enzo Enea, the global firm operates from offices in Miami, Brooklyn, Switzerland, and Italy, with US managing director Carolina Jaimes leading the team in America. From terraces to private gardens to public parks, Enea expertly crafts landscapes that respond to the local conditions and lessen the impact of climate change.

Get AD-Approved

Join the AD PRO Directory, our professional network that puts you in front of the right clients. Learn more

Are you looking for an interior decorator or designer to hire for your next project? Wherever you are, visit the AD PRO Directory to browse our list of AD-approved designers and find your match for a design consultation.
